text: The patch LGTM. Can you add a non-regression test ?

This looks good so far. Could you add a tests in nilearn/image/tests/test_image.py and nilearn/tests/test_masking.py? One for function new_img_like and compute_epi_mask

A dummy image can be created like this, for instance.
```python
data = np.ones((5, 6, 7))
img = nibabel.spm2.Spm2AnalyzeImage(data, affine=np.diag((4, 3, 2, 1)))
```
We might will have similar issues with nibabel.spm99.Spm99AnalyzeImage
Is there any option in nibabel where we can collectively check SpmAnalyze images for both ?

Update image.py

dtype issue for anlyzeImage
